I used to really love this game, I used to play it for hours with friends, but then the Meet Your Match update came out, I enjoyed it at first and then I realized that it's shit, matchmaking was fucked up and took 20 minutes to get into a normal game, they fixed that problem, then all me and my friend played played the alternative gamemodes.  We got into a game and we soon realized that there was a hacker on the enemy team,  there was also a Valve admin, the hacker decided to change his name to my friends name, the admin soon after attempted to ban the hacker but since the hacker had changed his name to my friends name my friend was the one who got banned...  We stopped playing after that and tried to get into contact with thta Valve admin but he wouldn't respond to anything.  We had this all on video as well.
meh

It is just my favorite game over Steam.
It is awesome to have fun with friends, and the concept of a class FPS makes it so original.

Things to fix: 

-There is no guide or effective tutorial for new players.
-Competitive matchmaking takes so long
-In casual mode there should be a class limit per team (2 of each class)
-Make it available to "join friend" in CASUAL matchmaking.

現在ある多種職業型FPSの原点にして最高峰。そのバランスたるや他ゲームの追随を許さない。ただただ人間を撃ち殺す対戦ゲームではなく、各自が勝利をつかむために欠かせない「チームプレイ」という至高の面白さを味わえる。12対12の24人対戦が主流となっており、初心者からベテランまで幅広い層が集まって熱いドラマを繰り広げる。
オススメのキャラクターはソルジャー。普通に走っているだけではただの的だが、ロケットジャンプを駆使して建物の上や敵の頭上から攻撃できるようになると世界が一変する。また、ロケットジャンプ中の敵を打ち落とすエアショットが決まれば爽快感は果てしなく増してくる。動画サイトでのフラッグムービーでも多数取り上げられているので必見である。
Все

Buen juego, El casual, la comunidad, lo malo:

El competitivo va demasiado mal, (almenos en latinoamerica) se demora en buscar 1 u 2 horas minimo si es que hay algo de personas jugando, y si entro, me toca jugar con personas de europa donde el ping me va alrededor de entre 200 y 300 minimo, hasta que no lo arreglen se puede seguir jugando casual, mvm, o Server comunitario donde se puede practicar 6vs6 y la gente no se enojara por que no sepas jugar y te enseñara lo basico del Competitivo y los roles de los personajes.
Nearly 10 years already, and still amazing! I only have like 500+ noob hours but within all that time I still have fun. I just hope Valve updates come faster though.

This game once was good, I use to love it, then I got Overwatch. After playing 100+ hours on Overwatch and then coming back to TF2, I realised, this game is a pile of crap. IMHO, these are my pros and cons
[b]Pros[/b]
~Huge variety with weapons
~Lots of community servers and maps
~Allows the community to make offical maps/weapons/items
~Runs smoothly of most new computers
~Lots of new people coming

[b]Cons[/b]
~The graphics/cartoony-style is hard on the eyes
~Lots of the community srevers come with this horrible frame lag, though you may have 60+ FPS, it still looks like your playing at 20- FPS
~The game Devs very often change/modify the game weapons, so by the time you fully understand how to use that item, it has changed
~Often the community is horrible (From my experience), I stopped playing the game for a while because I was enjoying Overwatch. I finally went back onto the game (The server I play on cuz of friends) and I asked them if I should sell my TF2 stuff because I think Overwatch is better. So the entire server had a huge screaming match over what game is better. I was on there for about 30 mins and had already made up my mine
~I have over 2600 hours (I have another account) and TF2 was the reason for me getting steam, I've seen how its changed so much over the past few years, the prices gone up and the community has colapsed
~I used to feel so welcomed in TF2, now I feel like I have to scream into the mic just to put my word of oppinion in
~Finally, TF2 was once an amazing game, it had meaning and I use to love playing it. I don't know whats happened, I don't know why it happened, but it has become horrible. I'm sorry if you don't believe it, its just my opinion.

That is my pros and cons about TF2. You may say otherwise, and I'm not saying you're wrong, I'm just giving what I think is right. Have a great day.
